video_description:
This is the extended version of the Dell Streak Rendezvous TV spot.
Music: "Multiplayer" by The Voluntary Butler Scheme
http://www.youtube.com/user/voluntarybutlertv
title: Dell Streak Rendezvous Commercial - Extended Version

comments.text:
